movies.title: Inception
movies.description: obb, a skilled burglar who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is given an opportunity to regain his old life as payment for a task considered impossible: 'inception' — the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious
cast: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Marc Raducci, Miranda Nolan, Marion Cotillard, Cillian Murphy

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: Rose DeWitt Bukater informs the narrative of her own life aboard the Titanic, 84 decades after. A Rose boards the boat with her mother and fiancé. Meanwhile, Fabrizio De Rossi and Jack Dawson win Third Class tickets aboard the boat. Rose informs the story from the departure of Titanic to its death--on its first and last voyage--about April 15, 1912.

movies.title: The Godfather

movies.title: Money Heist
movies.description: A person known as the Professor recruits a band of eight robbers who have a single feature to carry out the greatest heist ever : not one of them has anything to lose. Five weeks of seclusion - memorizing every step, every detail, every opportunity - culminate in eleven days locked up from the National Coinage and Stamp Factory of Spain, surrounded by police forces and with heaps of hostages in their capability, to learn whether their suicide bet will result in nothing or everything.
cast: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte, Paco Tous, Pedro Alonso

movies.title: Get Out
movies.description: Chris along with his girlfriend Rose go up state to go to her parents. movies.title: Avengers: Endgame

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Despite his loved ones baffling prohibit on music, Miguel fantasies to become the accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his ability, Miguel finds himself at the magnificent and colorful Land of the Dead after a mysterious chain of events. On the way, he matches charming trickster Hector, and they set off to uncover the story behind Miguel's family history.
